text: Maria Pańczyk-Pozdziej (10 January 1942 – 12 May 2022) was a Polish politician and journalist. She was a member of the Civic Platform. She was in the Senate of Poland from 2005 to 2019. Pańczyk-Pozdziej was born in Tarnowskie Góry, General Government, Germany. Pańczyk-Pozdziej died on 12 May 2022 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Polish journalists
title: Maria Pańczyk-Pozdziej
